details: Health Points are regenerated 300% more quickly than usual (outside of fights), and heals with consumables are 100% more effective than usual.
Experience gains and the chances of dropping loot are increased by 75% against all creatures considered to be in the Gobball family, including Mastogobs and Gobkools.
For each item crafted, Fishermen have a 25% chance of creating a second one.
Experience gained in the Fangs of Glass area is increased by 100%.
The chances of obtaining loot in the Valley of the Lady of the Water dungeon are increased by 125%.
Craftsmen save 15% of their ingredients when they craft items in the Scaraleaf Plain area.
The reward bonus on groups of monsters increases every 3 hours in the Nolifis Island area.
The quantity of Ash Wood harvested by lumberjacks is increased by 125%.
Experience gained by fighting Kanigers is increased by 150%.
All varieties of Ginger Dragoturkey will give birth to one extra baby.
The chances of obtaining loot in the Frozen Lake area are increased by 100%.
Bonuses gained by completing challenges are increased by 150% against creatures in the Boowolf family.
Trikortritt Surprises have been added to monster loot. When you use one, you'll either receive a Karnaval Doughnut or find yourself in a Too Faux Tofu outfit.
Anybody affected by the Chocrosis Curse will see experience gained by fighting monsters increase by 100%.
Experience gained in the Soft Oak Clearing is increased by 125%.
Hunters save 10% of their ingredients when they craft items.
The chances of obtaining loot from creatures in the Mushroom family are increased by 75%.
Bonuses gained by completing challenges are increased by 200% in the Ancestral Domain.
The quantity of fish harvested by fishermen of all levels is increased by 100%.
An extra challenge is generated for fights against monsters in the Tree Keeholo Trunk area.
Experience gained in the Gisgoul area is increased by 100%.
The chances of obtaining loot in the Dreggons' Sanctuary area are increased by 100%.
Resources will reappear 150% more quickly than usual in the Cania Fields area.
Experience gains and the chances of obtaining loot are increased by 35% in the Astrub Sewers zone.
Bonuses gained by completing challenges are increased by 200% in the Mount Tombs area.
Experience gained by fighting creatures in the Mino family is increased by 75%.
The quantity of Bloody Meat harvested by Hunters is increased by 125%.
The chances of obtaining loot from Moon Beach Monsters are increased by 75%.
Experience gained by fighting monsters and the chances of obtaining loot are increased by 100%. In addition, experience gained for all professions is increased by 50%.
